short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text for big bunches of things that I find funny. Inspired by Cloud-to-Butt, but with many more words substituted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add humorous word replacements for many common topics in news articles or current events. Very goofy.
